biotools.summary: pyHCA and hcatk (HCA toolkit) are a python library and executable for the Hydrophobic Cluster Analysis of protein sequences. pyHCA implements various class and function for handling sequences and analyses them hcatk provides off the hands set of program to perform hydrophobic cluster analyses.
